userNote.userText: 6/12/14. UW JLEMONDS. REFERRAL RCVD CALL FROM TERRELL IN SVC. INSD WAS NON-RENEWED AS OF 6/1/13, DUE TO DRIVING ACTIVITY. AGENT IS ATT TO WRITE IN PAS, AND ASKED IF WE CAN SINCE ACC FROM 6/25/11 IS OVER 33 MONTHS OLD. CONF VIA DD SCREEN THAT THIS IS THE CASE, AND THAT THEY ARE NOW ELIG FOR COVERAGE IN PAS. 1220P S/W RUTH CALLING FOR QUOTE TO COME BACK TO COMPANY SPK WITH JLEMONDS VERF THAT THEY ARE NOW ELIG FOR COVERAGE IN PAS TRANSF TO SALES FOR QUOTE
